iti32:4.1: “Dvīhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato puggalo yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye.
iti32:4.3: Pāpakena ca sīlena, pāpikāya ca diṭṭhiyā.
iti32:4.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, dvīhi dhammehi samannāgato puggalo yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye”ti.
iti32:6.1: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti.
